Room.Name: Inside a darkened plane
Room.Description: You find yourself within a plane of darkness, penetrated only by small points of light where strange shimmering gates can be found. Through the floating gates you can make out the strange flickering shapes of the real world beyond.

Exit.Description: A hole in the southern wall.

Room.Name: Inside a darkened plane
Room.Description: You find yourself within a plane of darkness, penetrated only by small points of light where strange shimmering gates can be found. Through the floating gates you can make out the strange flickering shapes of the real world beyond.

NPC.name: zombie
NPC.description: White bones peek out from beneath tattered rags as he grins at you with a malevolent aura.
NPC.longDescription: A zombie stands rotting here, awaiting his masters command.

NPC.name: fire elemental
NPC.description: Like a huge bonfire he stands there burning, the heat he emits is overwhelming to you.
NPC.longDescription: A burning column of flames stands here.

NPC.name: water elemental
NPC.description: Shaped from salt water it stands here, gurgling and swirling. Awaiting his masters command.
NPC.longDescription: A mass of surging water is here.

NPC.name: air elemental
NPC.description: Seemingly made of pure air, it twirls about here awaiting for its masters mere word to do his bidding.
NPC.longDescription: A violent vortex of swirling air is here.

NPC.name: earth elemental
NPC.description: A tall mass of earth moves slowly here, with roots and small branches mixxed in with the dirt it makes quiet an impressive sight.
NPC.longDescription: A huge mass of solid earth stands here.

NPC.name: falcon
NPC.description: With fine feathers he looks young, his eyes dart quickly to and fro looking for danger..or for dinner.
NPC.longDescription: A majestic looking falcon circles overhead.

NPC.name: wolf
NPC.description: A thick heavy coat covers this beast and long sharp teeth protrude from his mouth. Making him look like something that is best seen, and not touched.
NPC.longDescription: A grey wolf stands here, snarling softly.

NPC.name: bear
NPC.description: Larger then most men he towers above almost anything. Sharp claws, sharp teeth. One word sums it all up...sharp.
NPC.longDescription: A large bear is here, sharpening is claws on the ground.

NPC.name: lion
NPC.description: It looks very mean, with sharp claws and intelligent eyes you'd better think twice before tangling with it.
NPC.longDescription: A large mountain lion stands here, eyeing you suspiciously.

NPC.name: guard special
NPC.description: Selected from the strongest guard corp, these guards will stop at nothing to protect and uphold the law.
NPC.longDescription: A special guard is standing here.

NPC.name: flesh golem
NPC.description: The product of some twisted mage who has been tampering with the powers of necromancy. This horrible being is not quite alive, yet also not dead.
NPC.longDescription: A disgusting mass of stitched flesh stands here.

NPC.name: spirit unicorn
NPC.description: This unicorn is the spirit familiar of it's mortal form, summoned by a master of the arcane arts to serve as a familiar on the mortal planes.
NPC.longDescription: A powerful white unicorn is here.

NPC.name: spirit dragon
NPC.description: This familiar is the spirit familiar of it's mortal form, summoned by a master of the arcane arts to serve as a familiar on the mortal planes.
NPC.longDescription: A strange dragon is here.

NPC.name: shadow
NPC.description: A strange moving shadow is standing here restlessly, every few moments you think you can make out a face below it's veil of darkness but as quickly as it appears it is gone again.
NPC.longDescription: The shadow of %s has been severed and given substance.

NPC.name: iron golem
NPC.description: The product of some twisted mage who has been tampering with the powers of necromancy. This horrible being is not quite alive, yet also not dead.
NPC.longDescription: A large iron golem is here.

NPC.name: decoy
NPC.description: This life sized, scaled dummy looks exactly like someone...yet it also is strangely silent and unmoving.
NPC.longDescription: The shadow of %s has been severed and given substance.

NPC.name: armor
NPC.description: This piece of armor seems to be impossibly alive. It floats in the air with a life of it's own, awaiting it's creator's command.
NPC.longDescription: A large piece of armor is here.

NPC.name: weapon
NPC.description: This weapon seems to be impossibly alive. It floats in the air with a life of it's own, awaiting it's creator's command.
NPC.longDescription: A living weapon floats here.

NPC.name: key
NPC.description: This key seems to be impossibly alive. It floats in the air with a life of it's own, awaiting it's creator's command.
NPC.longDescription: A key is floating here.

NPC.name: fire giant slave
NPC.description: A dark fire-giant stands here. His entire body caked with dirt. He peers around himself trying to be useful to his master.
NPC.longDescription: A boughten fire-giant slave stands here.

NPC.name: skeleton
NPC.description: The bones of this undead are pristine clean and move with an impossible life of their own. Small burning points of red reside within the eye sockets, gleaming with dark magic.
NPC.longDescription: A zombie stands rotting here, awaiting his masters command.

NPC.name: mummie mummy
NPC.description: The tatttered and bloody remains of a corpse is here bound together by ragger bits of cloth. A dark set of hollow eyes stare back at you menacingly.
NPC.longDescription: A disgusting bloody mummy is here.

NPC.name: shadow
NPC.description: A strange moving shadow is standing here restlessly, every few moments you think you can make out a face below it's veil of darkness but as quickly as it appears it is gone again.
NPC.longDescription: The shadow of %s has been severed and given substance.

NPC.name: slave purgatory
NPC.description: *growl*
NPC.longDescription: A dark figure floats here, lurking amongst the shadows.
NPC.flags: NPC Wimpy Pet Warrior AreaAttack Fade

NPC.name: stalker guard
NPC.description: Angry, very angry.
NPC.longDescription: A stalker stands here, red with anger!
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Sneak Flying PassDoor Haste Regeneration DetectIllusion

NPC.name: beast
NPC.description: A snarling ball of claws, teeth, and fur stand before you, you should think twice before making it mad.
NPC.longDescription: A great beast stands here, impatiently clawing at the ground.

NPC.name: storm
NPC.description: This is a mighty storm made by magic.
NPC.longDescription: A storm rages on here.

NPC.name: blizzard
NPC.description: This is a blizzard.
NPC.longDescription: A blizzard rages on.

NPC.name: phantom
NPC.description: Ethereal Translucense
NPC.longDescription: A phantom flickers brightly here!

NPC.name: RATTLESNAKE
NPC.description: A large snake coils tightly shaking it's tail with a errie rattle sending shivers down your spine
NPC.longDescription: A large Rattlesnake is coiled here.

NPC.name: SPRITE
NPC.description: A small sprite weaves back and forth between the trees as it conjures magics to play with your head.
NPC.longDescription: A small radiant Sprite stands here.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis Infrared ProtectEvil Sneak PassDoor Swim Camouflage

NPC.name: Lynx
NPC.description: A short tailed cat like creature bounds all over, agile as any cat could be. It's paws are massive looking able to swat you with a pwerfull blow or disembowl you with its razor sharp claws and teeth.
NPC.longDescription: A agile Lynx bounces all around.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectHidden Sneak Haste DarkVision Berserk Camouflage

NPC.name: LEECH
NPC.description: Squirming all over this creature tries to bite you with its mouth opening it widely you see more teeth than you could count. It flatens it's body and contorts around your boots as you try to kick it away.
NPC.longDescription: A very large Leech tries to attach to your leg.

NPC.name: MOUND
NPC.description: A large mound of leaves and twigs and rotting material seems to be given life and lunges towards you trying to smother you within its massive body
NPC.longDescription: A huge Mound of leaves sways in the wind.

NPC.name: VINE
NPC.description: A large vine wriggles about behind it's master. With but a moments notice it is wraped about your feet and neck trying to strangle the life out of you.
NPC.longDescription: A Vine tries to wrap around your neck.

NPC.name: ALLIGATOR
NPC.description: Laying so still that you can not even see breath from it's gaping mouth. It looks as though it has aged more then a milenium
NPC.longDescription: An Alligator lies here looking like a log.
NPC.shortDescription: An Alligator lies here looking like a log

NPC.name: BAT
NPC.description: Flying way overhead a large Bat divebombs you trying to suck the very lifeblood from your viens.
NPC.longDescription: A large Bat flys high above.

NPC.name: GRIFFIN
NPC.description: Standing over ten feet this half falcon half lion creature sends shivers down the base of your spine. With claws of a lion that could disembowl you with but a quick swipe and the beak of a giant falcon to tear your eyes from your sockets, this beasts looks like it would eat you and pick your bones without a second thought.
NPC.longDescription: A Griffin stands firm sending a shiver down your spine.

NPC.name: BEAR
NPC.description: A very large brown bear paws the ground. Its feet are almost the size of your torso and it's claws could rip you in two with ease.
NPC.longDescription: A big brown Bear bounds towards you.

NPC.name: WOLF
NPC.description: Standing at least six feet in height this wolf looks as though it is big enough to swollow you whole. It drools so much you think it might be rabid, and the sent of your blood throws it into a frenzy.
NPC.longDescription: A large wolf foams at the mouth ready to strike.

NPC.name: WOLVERINE
NPC.description: The size of a large dog, this beast is all muscle. It ripples as it moves with gracelike fluidity. Showings it's claws they are nearly as long as it's entire body, and as sharp as the blade at it's master's side.
NPC.longDescription: A large Wolverine brandishes its claws at you.

NPC.name: WITCH
NPC.description: With a manacle laughter this woman sends shivers down your spine. Frail and gaunt this woman looks like she could not fight a cat for a scrap of food and win. Yet there seems to be power radiating from her.
NPC.longDescription: A Witch cackles gleefully at you.
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible Sanctuary ProtectEvil ProtectGood Flying PassDoor DetectIllusion

NPC.name: JAGUAR
NPC.description: A golden of the sun this beast does not hide from it's foes it meats them with speed and agility ready to pounce with a moments notice.
NPC.longDescription: A golden Jaguar stands ready to pounce on you.

NPC.name: WSNAKE WaterSnake Water Snake
NPC.description: A Snake gildes gracefully over land as well as water. Not detered from anything except to bask in the sun and digest it's prey.
NPC.longDescription: A WaterSnake glides around looking for something.

NPC.name: FISH Winged
NPC.description: Able to leap from the water this fish can soar about the land for a time. Using its wings it is able to flap them with such force it blows you almost over
NPC.longDescription: A winged Fish flys about looking in mid jump.

NPC.name: Naga
NPC.description: This half snake half something stares at you with cold eyes. Seemingly statuesk yet able to strike with a swiftness unfathomable.
NPC.longDescription: A greater Naga gazes at you silently.
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible ProtectGood Sneak Hide DarkVision Berserk Swim Regeneration DetectIllusion

NPC.name: LION
NPC.description: Ready for the hunt this lion body ripples with every movement. Muscles taunt and strained from the wait for the prey to come within reach.
NPC.longDescription: A lion sets itself ready for the hunt.

NPC.name: FALCON
NPC.description: Soaring in the sky at times you are not even able to see it. All you hear is the rush of wind as it passes by your face for another try to debiliate you.
NPC.longDescription: A large Falcon soar though the air magesticly.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis Sneak Flying Haste Berserk Camouflage DetectIllusion

NPC.name: rat
NPC.description: Its eyes glow with a crimson red. It is obvious it is enslaved by some form of evil. It mouth opens slightly to show a set of dagger like teeth.
NPC.longDescription: A rabid rat loams here staggering slightly.

Item.Name: ranger sack
Item.LongDescription: a sack lies here.

Item.Name: steak
Item.LongDescription: a steak lies here.

Item.Name: potion silver
Item.LongDescription: a potion of silver liquid lies here.

Item.Name: shield battleshield battle crusader
Item.LongDescription: a shield of the fineste make lies here waiting to be used.

Item.Name: staff
Item.LongDescription: a staff of purest wood lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Magic Flaming Frost Sharp Vorpal TwoHands Poison Unholy

Item.Name: longsword sword avenger
Item.LongDescription: a beautiful sword of divine make lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Magic NoDrop Bless AntiEvil AntiNeutral RotDeath

Item.Name: poncho carcass
Item.ShortDescription: a poncho from the carcass of someone
Item.LongDescription: A blood stained carcass lies here.

Item.Name: sword enforcer
Item.LongDescription: A steel sword engraved with a clenched fist is here.

Item.Name: map north Orthos
Item.LongDescription: A map of north Orthos lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: A map of Northern Orthos Icywastes Elven Valley Olympus Ofcol--New Ofcol | | | | | \ | | Magic Forest | | | \ --------Plains----------+ \ | | --------------------Gallow Hills Stone of G'Harne | | | Nightfall [Midgaard] This map shows the major areas north of midgaard. It is NOT to scale, and some of the directions are general only, indicating the basic location of each area relative to others.

Item.Name: protectorate plate
Item.LongDescription: Some platemail with the symbol of a clenched fist is here.

Item.Name: black blood badge
Item.ShortDescription: a black and bloody sherrif's badge
Item.LongDescription: A charred and blood smeared badge lies here.

Item.Name: quest sword
Item.LongDescription: A sword for a quest is here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum NoDrop Bless NoRemove NoUncurse

Item.Name: potion ARCPOTION
Item.LongDescription: A small glass flask containing a silvery liquid is here.

Item.Name: scroll ARCSCROLL
Item.LongDescription: A rolled up parchment is here.

Item.Name: wand ARCWAND
Item.LongDescription: A long silvery rod with a blue-green glow lies here.

Item.Name: staff ARCSTAFF
Item.LongDescription: A long smooth stick is here, pulsing with magical power.

Item.Name: berry
Item.LongDescription: A nice juicy berry is lying here.

Item.Name: skeleton npcskeleton npc_skeleton
Item.LongDescription: A rotting skeleton lies here.

Item.Name: sword unholy
Item.LongDescription: An unholy sword lies here, pulsing with power.

Item.Name: dagger unholy
Item.LongDescription: An unholy dagger lies here, pulsing with power.

Item.Name: spear unholy
Item.LongDescription: An unholy spear lies here, pulsing with power.

Item.LongDescription: An unholy mace lies here, pulsing with power.

Item.LongDescription: An unholy axe lies here, pulsing with power.

Item.LongDescription: An unholy flail lies here, pulsing with power.

Item.Name: whip unholy
Item.LongDescription: An unholy whip lies here, pulsing with power.

Item.Name: polearm unholy
Item.LongDescription: An unholy polearm lies here, pulsing with power.

Item.Name: clown mallet huge oversized hammer
Item.LongDescription: A grossly oversized hammer is here, begging to be touched.

Item.Name: chunk maple wood
Item.ShortDescription: a large chunk of maple wood
Item.LongDescription: A large chunk of maple wood lies here.

Item.Name: large chunk magic
Item.ShortDescription: a large chunk of magic wood
Item.LongDescription: A large chunk of magic wood lies here.

Item.Name: large chunk oak
Item.LongDescription: A large chunk of oak lies here.

Item.Name: maple wood staff
Item.LongDescription: A large longstaff of maple lies here.

Item.Name: magic staff
Item.ShortDescription: a shortstaff made of magic wood
Item.LongDescription: A shortstaff made of magic wood lies here.

Item.Name: oak staff
Item.LongDescription: A shortstaff made of oak lies here.

Item.Name: poison dagger poisonous
Item.LongDescription: A poisoned dagger lies here.
Item.Description: This dagger looks extremely sharp and drips with a coating of poison.

Item.Name: ranger staff
Item.LongDescription: A ranger staff lies here.
Item.Description: A simple ranger staff is a gnarled and twisted piece of wood, sturdy and hard, yet light and easy to hold.

Item.Name: ranger staff
Item.LongDescription: A ranger staff lies here.
Item.Description: A simple ranger staff is a gnarled and twisted piece of wood, sturdy and hard, yet light and easy to hold. Upon closer inspection, the ranger staff revealed intricate carvings and etchings along its length, telling the story of the wielders life and experiences in the forest. The carvings depicted animals, trees, and other natural elements, each one crafted with great care and precision. The staff is adorned with feathers, fur, and other natural materials, collected by the woodsman on his travels through the forest. These decorations are not merely for show, but serves to enhance the staff's connection to the wild creatures around it.

Item.Name: ranger spear
Item.LongDescription: A ranger spear lies here.
Item.Description: A simple ranger spear is a gnarled and twisted piece of wood, sturdy and hard, yet light and easy to hold.

Item.Name: ranger spear
Item.LongDescription: A ranger spear lies here.
Item.Description: A simple ranger spear is a gnarled and twisted piece of wood, sturdy and hard, yet light and easy to hold. Upon closer inspection, the ranger spear revealed intricate carvings and etchings along its length, telling the story of the wielders life and experiences in the forest. The carvings depicted animals, trees, and other natural elements, each one crafted with great care and precision. The spear is adorned with feathers, fur, and other natural materials, collected by the woodsman on his travels through the forest. These decorations are not merely for show, but serves to enhance the spear's connection to the wild creatures around it.

Item.Name: steak
Item.LongDescription: A juicy steak carved from {0} is lying here.
Item.Description: A juicy steak carved from {0} smells delicious.
